title: Define Custom Tools
description: Create tool definitions for AI agents to use
instructions:
Implement `defineCalculatorTool()` that returns a tool definition with:
1. name: 'calculator'
2. description: Clear explanation of what the tool does
3. input_schema: JSON schema with properties for operation (add/subtract/multiply/divide) and numbers array

Follow Claude's tool use format.
hints: Use JSON Schema format for input_schema
numbers should be an array of numbers
